meanings.definition: In a blazing manner; very brightly or intensely.
meanings.sent1: The sun shone blazingly in the sky, making everything bright.
meanings.sent2: The fireworks lit up the night sky blazingly.
meanings.sent3: The campfire roared blazingly, scaring away the darkness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a blazingly radiant beacon in the room.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the sunset blazingly, capturing its fiery beauty.

meanings.sent1: The cheetah ran blazingly across the savannah, leaving dust in its wake.
meanings.sent2: He typed blazingly on the keyboard, finishing the report in record time.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel darted blazingly up the tree, surprising the cat.
meanings.sent4: Time flew by blazingly fast during the exciting game.
meanings.sent5: The car sped down the highway blazingly, reaching top speed.
